patterns: What can you help me with?
responses: Thanks for asking! I am your mental health friend! I've been trained to support you through any issues you are dealing with. Want to tell me what's wrong? I'm all ears! Technically, I'm a computer that's been trained by a human to assist you, so I don't have real ears... But I like to think of myself as human!

patterns: Can I have some information about anxiety?
How do I support a loved one with anxiety?
How do I fix my anxiety?
responses:
Anxiety is very common! A lot of people struggle with it. Anxiety can happen when our brain is low on the hormones dopamine, serotonin, 
oxytocin, and endorphin. But don't worry! I can teach you how to boost them so you feel better! Which one do you want to start with?
